duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direction and supervision to support a sales-driving culture and ensure a consistent customer experience.
Engage and connect with customers, offering information on merchandise, store promotions, and executing operational processes effectively.
Onboard, train, and develop associates to perform key accountabilities effectively and uphold company standards.
Support sales, hospitality, operations, people, and conversion through the Shop C3 Program, focusing on driving sales and delivering a genuine customer experience.
Build customer connections, ensure all customers feel respected, appreciated, and rewarded, and solve their shopping needs effectively.
Leverage omni-channel offerings to provide a frictionless customer experience and execute operational processes accurately and efficiently.
Convert, open, and activate Kohl’s Card applications, providing savings consultation and courteous service to customers.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's degree preferred)
